name: Source Code To Freedom X Crisvond

metadata.name: Source Code to FREEDOM x Crisvond #1
metadata.description: Experience the mesmerizing world of generative art with Source Code to Freedom x Crisvond. This interactive and dynamic piece, created with sketch.js, will responds to the highs of the accompanying musical soundtrack, generating a unique pattern each time you press the NFT.It starts as a Pre-holder that will eventually transform into a still image, and after three weeks, will evolve into the code for the interactive NFT in its final form, The result is a truly one-of-a-kind piece of motion art that adds an additional layer of depth and excitement to the listening experience. Get ready to be transported on a journey of captivating visuals and sounds.
